item.title: Problem Solving: Windows DNS Server in Azure returns SERVFAIL
item.description: Introduction I had been troubleshooting a fairly tricky DNS resolution issue and wanted to share what I learned with all of you. Most of the DNS lookup issues I’ve encountered in my career, have been the result of a misconfigured zone, record, or a server outage. I cannot recall a time with a Windows DNS server, where I’ve had to adjust default setting, but that’s exactly what I’ve had to do.
